Title: French LNG strikes deepen LNG discounts to TTF amid scarce import slots in Europe
Description: The discounts to the Dutch TTF gas hub price for LNG deliveries to Europe have deepened amid continuing strikes at France’s LNG receiving terminals as available import slots remain scarce with cargoes diverted from these terminals staying within the region.
Author: CK

Title: Pavilion Energy ships first small-scale LNG cargo to Hangjiaxin; arrival this week
Description: Chinese city gas distributor Zhejiang Hangjiaxin Clean Energy is poised to receive its first small-scale LNG cargo from Singapore’s Pavilion Energy by the end of this week, with the cargo’s arrival marking the start of a 0.5 mtpa term supply agreement between the two firms.
Author: CK
